general.gigTitle: do wordpress website development and web design

sellerCard.description:
Greetings!

My name is Abdul Afaq. I am a professional WordPress developer & Graphic designer expert with 5 years of solid experience in both web development & Graphic design.

Website is my right hand & Graphic design is my left hand.

description.content:
Welcome to my shop!


Creating dynamic success through expertly crafted WordPress websites and cutting-edge web design solutions that captivate and convert.


I am dedicated to comprehending your needs and translating them into a highly professional WordPress website design, leveraging the power of Elementor. My commitment is to ensure utmost satisfaction, empathy, and deliver a memorable service for every client.


So here are the Unique Features Of my Gig:

  • Responsive, Professional, clean and modern designs
  • A fortress of speed optimization and security for your digital realm
  • Ensuring seamless compatibility across all browsers
  • SEO Optimized
  • Social Media Integration
  • Any kind of custom WordPress design
  • Amazing Sliders
  • Maps, Forms, Google Analytics integration
  • Newsletter and mailing lists (MailChimp)
  • Amazing Sliders
  • Top-notch design
  • Easy to edit Page Builders


Why choose me?

  • Create any kind of Fully editable modern web design
  • Live time support
  • Video tutorial for you to manage wordpress website
  • Unlimited Revisions
  • Redesign wordpress website specifically for your target audience
  • Available 24/7 and on-time delivery

questionsAndAnswers.question: I am ready to purchase! What do I need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You would need a domain and a hosting account (if you don't have these, Don't worry. I will assist you). I'll also need your logo, a few sentences about your website/company, email address to configure forms.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to edit my WordPress website easily?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: DON'T WORRY !!! Don't need to be technical savvy. I'll Design in a way that you just need to drag and drop things to add or edit the content. I'll also available after your project is delivered.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can You Redesign the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, If you have an outdated website and an sample site - I will redesign it with a modern design and premium look and feel.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if your requirements does not meet any of my package?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Don't worry, just contact me and we will discuss your requirements and will come up with a customized package or cost.

packageList.title: Small size Website
packageList.description: WordPress, Theme and plugins installation, Responsive & modern design.

packageList.title: Medium size Website
packageList.description: 5 WordPress pages, Contact form, Responsive & modern design. 10 days Free support

packageList.title: Full size Website
packageList.description: 10 WordPress pages, Contact form, Responsive & modern design. 1 month Free support and maintaince

reviews.comment:
Excellent Website Design!

I had the pleasure of working with Abdul from Fiverr, and he did an amazing job creating my website! He was incredibly professional, responsive, and understood exactly what I was looking for. The design is clean, modern, and user-friendly, and he even went above and beyond to make sure every detail was perfect. The whole process was smooth and stress-free. I highly recommend Abdul for anyone needing a high-quality website. Fantastic work!

This was my second gig with Abdul Afaq, and he truly outdid himself in delivering exceptional website development services that exceeded my expectations. His professionalism and meticulous attention to detail were evident in every aspect of the project. With proactive communication and a remarkable depth of understanding, Abdul not only met my needs but went above and beyondmaking him a pleasure to work with! Great job, Abdul Afaq!

I had an amazing experience working with Abdul. His attention to detail, commitment to meeting deadlines, and exceptional communication made this project a success. Not only did he deliver high-quality work ahead of schedule, but he also went above and beyond to ensure everything met my expectations. I highly recommend him for anyone looking for professionalism, creativity, and reliability. Will definitely be working with him again!

I had the pleasure of working with Abdul Afaq for my website development project, and I couldn't be happier! His expertise and attention to detail exceeded all my expectations. Abdul was responsive, creative, and truly listened to my needs, delivering a stunning website that perfectly captures my vision. Highly recommend him for anyone seeking top-notch web development!

Abdul Afaq delivered EXCEPTIONAL work on our website development project, showcasing remarkable PROFESSIONALISM. Working with him was a breeze, as he went above and beyond with stellar communication and cooperation. Highly recommend his services!

reviews_snippet.comment: Abdul built my business website in just 2 weeks, and I couldn't be more pleased with the results. After trying for over a year to get my website off the ground, Abdul came through with professionalism, patience, and a deep understanding of branding interpretation. He is incredibly focused, always offering help and solutions. What impressed me the most is how he consistently finds ways to mitigate any gaps and keep the process moving forward. I truly appreciate his dedication and will definitely continue working with him. I 100% recommend Abdul for any project, whether simple or complex. Keep it up, Abdul!

I had the pleasure of working with Abdul to design and develop my website, and I couldnt be more impressed with the results. From the initial consultation to the final launch, Abdul demonstrated exceptional professionalism, technical expertise, and a keen eye for design. The project was delivered on time and exceeded my expectations in both functionality and aesthetics. Communication was seamless throughout the process, with timely updates and a collaborative approach that made me feel involved at every step. I highly recommend Abdul to anyone seeking high-quality web development servicestruly a top-tier expert in his field!

The freelancer delivered outstanding work on our subscription tier descriptions project. Their attention to detail and thoroughness exceeded expectations in several key areas:
Professionalism:

Maintained clear communication throughout the project
Met all deadlines consistently
Responded promptly to revision requests
Showed great initiative in suggesting improvements

Quality of Work:

Produced detailed, well-structured content
Maintained consistent tone and branding across all materials
Included comprehensive features and benefits lists
Created cohesive marketing narratives for each tier

Attention to Detail:

Perfectly aligned descriptions with our brand voice
Ensured accuracy in all produ

Abdul Afaq delivered exceptional work with a high level of professionalism and incredible attention to detail. He not only met but EXCEEDED my expectations. Working with him was fantastichis deep understanding, cooperative spirit, and quick responsiveness made the project a success!

Abdul has won me over for any web development help I will need in the future! He was very quick to respond and resolve the issues I was having on my new website for my start up. It is so valuable having a professional in your corner. Don't pass up the chance to work with Abdul!!
